The Flyers are 35-35-10-2 at home and 26-45-11-4 away. The Flyers are 10-1-1-4 in the last 16 games at Boston. Boston has won nine of the last 15 in Philly. The visiting team has won 13 of the last 18 games. 19 of the last 27 games played have been decided by one goal or less. The teams have split four PO series. Boston is 11-9 in 20 games. Philly is 6-4 at home and 3-7 away. 1960s: October
